### LEZIONE 8-5-2023
PARTE1: PROGRAMMABILITA'
ind0: addi r1,r0,4 -> 0000 0000 0000 0001    cost000000000000100 = 00010004
ind1: jr r1 -> 0000 0100 0010 0000 00000 000 = 04200000


1000 = 8
1001 = 9
1010 = a
1011 = b
1100 = c
----------------------------
PARTE2: CONTROLLO DEL FLUSSO
//INIZIO IF
ind0: addi r1,r0,1 -> 0000 0000 0000 0001    cost000000000000001 = 00010001
ind1: addi r2,r0,2 -> 0000 0000 0000 0010    cost000000000000010 = 00020002
ind2: seq r1,r1,r2 -> 0000 1100 0010 0010 00001 000 0... = 0c220800h 
ind3: beqz r1,2 ->    0001 0000 0010 0000 0000000...2: 10200002 //se r1==0, jump a 4

ind4: addi r3,r0,9 -> 0000 0000 0000 0011    cost0000000000001001 = 00030009h
ind5: j 1 -> 0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 = 08000001h

ind6: addi r3,r0,5 //Ã¨ verificata -> 0000 0000 0000 0011    cost0000000000000101 = 00030005h
//FINE IF

ind7: sb 15(r0),r3  -> 0001 0100 0000 0011  cost000000a = 1403000ah


-----------------
ISTRUZIONI
#ADDI (2)
addi   rd,rs1,cost
000000 rs1 rd cost

#JR (4)
j rs1
000001 rs1 rs2 rd
pc<-a

#J (5)
j offset
000010 offset
pc<-pc+offset | wepc14, oe1pc15, costen, aluctrl(+) | rom1: 0000 0000 0000 0000 1100 0000 0001 0000 = 0000c010h | rom2: 0 0000 0000 0000 0100 0000 = 000040h

#SEQ (6)
seq rd, rs1, rs2
000011 rs1, rs2, rd
a==b? mj1 | oe1a6, oe2b10, aluctrl(-), mj1, mjenable | rom1: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0100 0101 1001 = 0000459h | rom2: 0 0011 0000 0000 0000 0000 = 030000h
c<-0 mj1 | wec, aluctrl(0), mj1 | rom1: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 1000 0001 1111 = 000081fh | 
rom2: 0 0010 0000 0000 0000 0000 = 020000h
c<-1 | wec, aluctrl(1) | rom1: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 1000 0001 1110 = 000081eh | 
rom2: 0 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 = 000000h
rd<-c | oe1c12, rd | rom1: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0001 0000 0000 0000 = 0001000h | 
rom2: 0 0000 0000 0000 1000 0000 = 000080h


#BEQZ (10)
beqz rs1, offset
000100 rs1, r0, offset
a==0? | oe1a6, oe2b aluctrl(+0), beqzen15(r2), muxbeqz14(r2)spento | rom1: 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0100 0101 0010 = 0000452h | rom2: 0 0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 = 008000h
pc<-pc+offset | wepc14, oe1pc15, costen, aluctrl(+) | rom1: 0000 0000 0000 0000 1100 0000 0001 0000 = 0000c010h | rom2: 0 0000 0000 0000 0100 0000 = 000040h

#SB (12)
sb 0(rs1), rs2
000101 rs1, rd, cost
mar<-a+cost | oe1a, wemar23, costen, aluctrl(+) | rom1: 0000 0000 1000 0000 0000 0000 0101 0000 = 00800050h | rom2: 0 0000 0000 0000 0100 0000 = 000040h
mdr<-b | oe1b, wemdr | rom1: 0000 0100 0000 0000 0000 0010 0000 0000 = 04000200h | rom2: 0 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 = 0000000h
m[mar]<-mdr | oe2mar25, oe1mdr27, muxindmar(a 0), memwr | rom1: 0000 1010 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 = 0a000000h | rom2: 0 0000 0000 0000 0000 1000 = 0000008h
